previewArticle.title: Montreal Impact vs. FC Edmonton | Canadian Championship Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Montreal Impact 4, FC Edmonton 2 | Canadian Championship Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Championnat canadien en toute intimité. #IMFC http://t.co/1bfwRkphcO

timelineItems.name: Jarosi Sports Law
timelineItems.text: DiVaio and Ferrari not in the XVIII for Montreal tonight. #MLS #imfc

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: 1-0 Impact, Jack Mac. Superbe accélération de Justin Mapp et centre dévié par Felipe #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Justin Mapp.

timelineItems.name: Andre Gagne
timelineItems.text: Encore un énorme jeu de #Mapp qui fait tout!! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: 2e but en 2 matchs de champ canadien pour McInerney. 3e but en 6 matchs avec l'Impact #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Tomi Ameobi (FC Edmonton).
Delay in match Mike Banner (FC Edmonton) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: I always said that if @FCEdmontonNow were going to win this #VCup semi, they would have to score tonight at @StadeSaputo... #canChamp

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: So, both Montreal teams leading 1-0 at this point. Edmonton somewhat more likeable.

timelineItems.name: Nicolas A Martineau
timelineItems.text: L'Impact joue comme une équipe de la MLS devrait le faire contre une équipe de la NASL. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp exploite tout l'espace qu'on lui donne ce soir, et même davantage, en début de rencontre #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Montréal virtuellement qualifié. Quelle sera la réaction d'Edmonton ? Et Montréal va-t-il reculer ou chercher un 2e but ? #MTLvEDM

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact).
Frank Jonke (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Bloody hell, Justin Mapp.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jeb Brovsky (Montreal Impact).
Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Paméla O'Neill
timelineItems.text: Nice evening #IMFC #foot ⚽️

timelineItems.name: JF Dupont Viel
timelineItems.text: #IMFC un message des ultras ? Je crois que leurs cœurs sont à l'envers http://t.co/cIcbbK1As0

timelineItems.name: JF Dupont Viel
timelineItems.text: #IMFC un message des ultras ? Je crois que leurs cœurs sont à l'envers http://t.co/cIcbbK1As0

timelineItems.name: Olivier P. Lemieux
timelineItems.text: Pendant ce temps au Stade Saputo, l'Impact vient de se souvenir qu'il est un club de la MLS #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Laurent
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp looking like Iniesta tonight #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp. Wow. Wow. Wow. On sait plus quoi ajouter. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: John Leung 梁仲賢
timelineItems.text: Remember #IMFC, all Edmonton needs is a goal to screw this all up again. Aww, who are we kidding? Montreal will find a way to screw it up.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Évidemment, gradins très dégarnis au stade Saputo. Même les ultras sont très peu nombreux #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Valeria
timelineItems.text: En direct #stadesaputo pour supporter #IMFC @impactmontreal http://t.co/sHDNcRyVcy

timelineItems.name: Valeria
timelineItems.text: En direct #stadesaputo pour supporter #IMFC @impactmontreal http://t.co/sHDNcRyVcy

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Une bannière que la sécurité a consenti a laisser passer (elle est pas dans la section des ultras ) #IMFC http://t.co/TzWOEPbASV

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Une bannière que la sécurité a consenti a laisser passer (elle est pas dans la section des ultras ) #IMFC http://t.co/TzWOEPbASV

timelineItems.name: Bluecollardan
timelineItems.text: Point made! #imfc #imfclive http://t.co/cP2yVepU67

timelineItems.name: Bluecollardan
timelineItems.text: Point made! #imfc #imfclive http://t.co/cP2yVepU67

timelineItems.name: #ThankYouVidic
timelineItems.text: #GoHabsGo #IMFC big night for Québec #imfclive

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Un aperçu des gradins du SS vers l'est.... #IMFC http://t.co/DUfOq6Tbzq

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Un aperçu des gradins du SS vers l'est.... #IMFC http://t.co/DUfOq6Tbzq

timelineItems.name: Dominic Pellerin
timelineItems.text: Quand Warner n'est pas la....tout va beaucoup mieux #imfclive #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Vachon
timelineItems.text: Nyassi au coeur d'une action offensive en milieu de terrain! C'est ça le changement de Joey Saputo! #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Justin Mapp with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Could prove an important night for the confidence of @JackMcInerney9... @impactmontreal need him to start scoring regularly. #VCup #canChamp

timelineItems.name: Jeff Salisbury
timelineItems.text: #FCE's simply giving the ball away in midfield constantly and giving #IMFC odd-man breaks. Both goals created this way.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Bernier aura vraisemblablement un role plus offensif avec Bernadello à ses côtés. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: James Covey FC
timelineItems.text: I realize this is sub-MLS competition but I'm forced to wonder where this team has been all season. Another level for #IMFC energy-wise.

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Montreal Impact 4, FC Edmonton 2.

timelineItems.name: Liborio Argento
timelineItems.text: Habs and Impact are both winning! #Montreal #GoHabsGo #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Kareem Moses (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: #Mapp2Brazil

timelineItems.name: Richard Schofield
timelineItems.text: #IMFC is actually playing like a 1st division team playing a 2nd division team

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Tomi Ameobi (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Lance Laing.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Giordano Cescutti
timelineItems.text: Mapp is video gaming out there tonight. Just having his way #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Daryl Fordyce (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Edson Edward.

timelineItems.name: JF Dupont Viel
timelineItems.text: #IMFC canadian championship is always special at saputo. http://t.co/PBu7p3Nkk4

timelineItems.name: JF Dupont Viel
timelineItems.text: #IMFC canadian championship is always special at saputo. http://t.co/PBu7p3Nkk4

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Hier, McInerney me disait qu'il sentait que la chimie allait opérer. Et ben, c'est le cas ! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Le message des @ultrasmontreal est clair. #IMFC http://t.co/wwtmQJtHqv

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Le message des @ultrasmontreal est clair. #IMFC http://t.co/wwtmQJtHqv

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Anne B-G
timelineItems.text: Un coucher de soleil d'impacts c'est une des plus belles choses du monnnnnde. #imfclive #imfc http://t.co/PvIpgNaYyR

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Comment expliquer l'absence de Lefevre rare satisfaction du dernier match. Le manque de rythme ? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Les Ultras passent plusieurs messages négatifs, alors que l'équipe mène quand même 2-0 #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Frank Jonke (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jeb Brovsky (Montreal Impact).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Jeb Brovsky (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Brovsky assommé par le ballon en plein visage. Son nez n'aime pas les matchs de championnat canadien #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Albert Watson (FC Edmonton).
Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Melisa
timelineItems.text: Pauvre Jeb, toujours des ballons en pleine face #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Mapp for McInerney again, but offside flag was up.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Justin Mapp tries a through ball, but Jack McInerney is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Pas convaincu par Pearce en défense centrale (ou ailleurs) #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Patrice Bernier.
Hand ball by Mallan Roberts (FC Edmonton).

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Le rythme du match est retombé après 20mn intéressantes et long arrêt de jeu pour la blessure de Nyassi. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Mapp est clairement un gars de soir de 7eme match. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Jeb Brovsky (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton).

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Yeah man. RT @MLSAnalyst: #MappForBrazil. Seriously.

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: FC Edmonton is making Mapp look like a Soccer God out there. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Albert Watson (FC Edmonton).

timelineItems.name: X Gamer
timelineItems.text: Si #IMFC gagne, on se voit le 4 juin au Stade Saputo pour la Finale ! #bleublancnoir

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: If Mapp could play this way during every MLS game, he'd have his own supporters' group. #TheMappQuesters #DressLikeaGPS #IMFC cc @514Sports

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Mallan Roberts.
Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Jeb Brovsky.

timelineItems.name: James H.
timelineItems.text: All 50 fans at the #IMFC game look like they're having fun

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).
Neil Hlavaty (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: I get that they're playing a Div2 squad, but this is not the first time Mapp has looked impressive this year. Consistently best #IMFC player

timelineItems.comment: Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Edson Edward (FC Edmonton).

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canChamp HT in Montreal has @impactmontreal on top 2-0 over @FCEdmontonNow Watch the 2nd half live on @Sportsnet One & TVASports

timelineItems.name: Thomas C.
timelineItems.text: Pas de DiVa ni de Ferrari. 'Suis heureux #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Steven Sandor
timelineItems.text: #FCEd look out of sorts having to use a natural fullback in central midfield (Edwards) after Banner injury.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Montreal Impact 2, FC Edmonton 0.

timelineItems.name: Adam
timelineItems.text: Maybe Boakai creates some more second half magic? I know, that's probably reaching. #FCEd

timelineItems.name: FC Edmonton
timelineItems.text: A reminder that if #FCEd score tonight, the tie would be pushed into extra time. A draw would put the Eddies through to the #ACC Final.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Ameobi off. HOW COULD THEY?

timelineItems.name: oliviermaltais
timelineItems.text: C'est au stade Saputo que ça se passe. #imfc #allezmontreal

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Montreal Impact 2, FC Edmonton 0.
Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton).
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Mallan Roberts.

timelineItems.name: Neil Crawford
timelineItems.text: 3-0. Thats the tie I would think. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Pendant que les Bruins marquent, Brovsky marque de la tête et fait 3-0 Impact #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Larson
timelineItems.text: No better feeling for an MLS team than to punish a pesky lower division side. There was revenge on the mind tonight. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Jeb Brovsky (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.text: Go figure! @JebBrovsky scores a sexy goal when I'm not at the game! What a stud!!! � #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Elena
timelineItems.text: Yé 3-0 #IMFC / Zut 2-1 #Habs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact).
Lance Laing (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: They say that a 2-goal lead is the most dangerous in soccer (#IMFC's de facto sitch), but home side has all the momentum right now

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jack McInerney with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Neil Crawford
timelineItems.text: Attendance looks as poor as results have been for #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Robert Grabe
timelineItems.text: Is THIS #IMFC's strongest team?

timelineItems.name: Ann
timelineItems.text: #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Steven Sandor
timelineItems.text: #FCEd looks like a team that's played two per week for the last four weeks. #Exhausted

timelineItems.text: (Pssst! This is when Boakai scores a cheeky hattrick.) #VCup

timelineItems.name: paul delude
timelineItems.text: Regarder Justin mapp jouer aujourd'hui c'est du caviar. Que c'est beau. #impacttvasports #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.

timelineItems.name: Jeff Salisbury
timelineItems.text: @FCEdmontonNow needs to tighten it up a bit. They need to believe they can compete physically w/ #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Public épars, +/- distrait pour match à sens unique... Me sens un peu comme au Camp Nou pour un #Barça - #Figueras (2d B) #Copa #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: RoselineMoreauDionne

timelineItems.text: I want to know what athletes say when they get all up in eachother's faces. But something tells me it involves "your mama".#imfc #habs

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Les changements se font attendre. 3-0, il me semble qu'on devrait préserver quelques joueurs #Mapp #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Edmonton commence à être menaçant #MTLvEDM

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: #FCEd starting to rap on #IMFC's door. Too much time left in this game to shut things completely down, methinks.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Sanna Nyassi.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: On donne de l'espace à Boakai et ça vient à un cheveux de coûter un but #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Êtes vous surpris de voir Mapp, Camara, Bernier (ou d'autres) encore sur le terrain ? 3-0 contre la terrible équipe Edmonton. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: But Edmonton. Ce n'était qu'une question de temps, Impact trop défensif. 3-1 #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: BUUUUUUT 3-1 fear the rabbit !!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: We need to sign that kid, ASAP.. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Boakai complice. Si Edmonton fait 3-2, Edmonton passe en raison des buts à l'étranger #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Well this just got exciting from nowhere for the Eddies. #VCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Justin Mapp with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Penalty kick Edmonton. This is so Impact.

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: I'm sick of Ouimettes grabbing, even with that dive. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: Just... Wow. #canChamp

timelineItems.name: Nicolas A Martineau
timelineItems.text: 3-2 Impact. Si le score demeure ainsi, l'#IMFC est éliminé!

timelineItems.name: bishopvillered
timelineItems.text: Well, that went sideways for #IMFC Tuned out for a bit, didn't take the first goal as a warning sign. Inexcusable. #canChamp #FCEd

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: I don't believe what i just saw #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Donc, #IMFC doit marquer pour se qualifier!

timelineItems.text: AMAZING SAVE! #FCEd

timelineItems.name: Matt Banks
timelineItems.text: I can't handle this #VCup match right now... This is awesome.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Horace James (FC Edmonton) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Daryl Fordyce following a fast break.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Breaking: Justin Mapp is really good.

timelineItems.name: Blue and White Army
timelineItems.text: Oh, you Eddies... #VCup

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: 6 minutes d'arrêts de jeu, cardiaques s'abstenir #MTLvEDM

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: En espérant que la conférence de presse ne tourne pas autour de ce penalty... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sean Clarke
timelineItems.text: Sweet merciful crap the clock is ticking slowly #vcup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Karl Ouimette.
Foul by Kareem Moses (FC Edmonton).
Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Rituro
timelineItems.text: I can't remember the last time I was this tense watching a game involving none of the teams I cheer for. #VCup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Albert Watson.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Les Ultras vert de rage. #IMFC http://t.co/ofU1Vvn42T

timelineItems.name: Marco D'Onofrio
timelineItems.text: Montreal have been the far superior team tonight they got caught slipping and now time is getting away from them.. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: PENALTY #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Les Ultras vert de rage. #IMFC http://t.co/ofU1Vvn42T

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Marco D'Onofrio
timelineItems.text: Looks like a harsh call to me.. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mark Appleton
timelineItems.text: Cup competitions what do you know? Huge make up call on the PK #IMFCvFCE #vcup

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Épaule le point de contact. Pas un penalty ca #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Daryl Fordyce (FC Edmonton).
Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Hernán Bernardello.
Penalty conceded by Kareem Moses (FC Edmonton) with a hand ball in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Robert Grabe
timelineItems.text: Despite #IMFC's best efforts, they may win this after all.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Bernier fait 3-3, les joueurs d'Edmonton en furie #MTLvEDM

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Cela dit, deux mauvaises décisions de l'officiel sur les deux penalty du match selon moi #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Yitzaac
timelineItems.text: Worst hand ball call of all time? #VCup

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Edmonton were robbed. #canChamp

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: O' Captain, My Captain! #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: Bernier celebrating... Guys, I'm glad we won, but there's no pride in this game. This was the NASL's worst team that almost beat you. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Duane Rollins
timelineItems.text: I really don't care from a TFC partisan perspective. Playing #IMFC likely better. I'm angry for @FCEdmontonNow

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: Even as a neutral from another country that's infuriating. #MTLvEDM

timelineItems.name: Ben_Tier
timelineItems.text: I was rooting for Montreal but that was a screw job. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Montreal Impact 4, FC Edmonton 2.

timelineItems.name: Kristin Knowles
timelineItems.text: Horrible end. Horrible. Wrong on so many levels. #VCup

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Tous les joueurs et le coach d'Edmonton enguirlandent les officiels après le sifflet final. Victoire de l'Impact #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Penney
timelineItems.text: Do all the crazy games happen in Montreal? #canChamp #acc

timelineItems.name: Daniel Squizzato
timelineItems.text: Colin Miller and Joey Saputo jawing back and forth. Amazing. #VCup

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: That being said, no one at #IMFC should be happy about that result. Poor, poor, poor.
